EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-09-27
EmailTemplate.subject: The 8.5 Things We Learned at SpringOne Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 28, 2018 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/8-1-2-things-we-learned-at-springone-platform-new-ideas-and-key-affirmations-for-the-modern-enterprise?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The 8.5 Things We Learned at SpringOne Platform Pivotal’s goal is to help your enterprise become a learning organization so you can go fast forever. As SpringOne Platform has ended, it seems only fitting to reflect on what we’ve learned at the conference. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/8-1-2-things-we-learned-at-springone-platform-new-ideas-and-key-affirmations-for-the-modern-enterprise?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pcf-2-3?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.3 Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.3 is powered by industrialized open source and helps you deliver superior business outcomes. We recap the latest release. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pcf-2-3?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://youtu.be/Jip10Fz693U> "Failure is Part of the Process" Jason Williams, Vice President of Customer Technology at Dick's Sporting Goods, talks about their digital transformation journey at SpringOne Platform 2018. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/Jip10Fz693U]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-act?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Announcing Pivotal Act Learn about Pivotal Act, our new initiative to work with clients in the social impact sector. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-act?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pks-1-2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> PKS 1.2 Adds AWS: More Multi-Cloud for Your Kubernetes With the coming GA of PKS 1.2, we’ve further extended the range of clouds available to run the latest release of Kubernetes, certified compatible by the CNCF. PKS 1.2 also includes a range of production-ready capabilities that enhance security, availability, and reliability for Kubernetes workloads. Dig Into PKS 1.2 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pks-1-2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-announces-winners-of-the-2018-partner-awards?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Announces Winners of the 2018 Partner Awards We recognized a number of our partners at SpringOne Platform 2018 for their outstanding solutions and services delivered with us and our products. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-announces-winners-of-the-2018-partner-awards?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://devops.com/pivotal-software-extends-development-platform-reach/]]> Pivotal Software Extends Development Platform Reach At SpringOne Platform 2018 we announced an expansion of its implementation of the Cloud Foundry platform-as-a-service (PaaS) environment in addition to extending its support for Kubernetes to the Amazon Web Services (AWS) public cloud. Get the breakdown from DevOps.com Read More <[[https://devops.com/pivotal-software-extends-development-platform-reach/]]> Upcoming Events 10/01-10/04, Core Spring Training Session, Singapore <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1094?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletterr]]>
10/03, The Methodology of Modern Software Organisations, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-4-the-methodology-of-modern-software-organisations-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletterr]]>
10/09-10/10, SpringOne Tour, San Francisco <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
